issue.title: [Plasma] Integrate TensorFlow Op with arrow packaging scripts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2737](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2737). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not sure what is involved here and what the best steps forward are. We should first collect experience from deploying the current op with Ray and then see what the right deployment strategy is.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2737?focusedCommentId=17585917) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
